page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: I got up and wondered if we were going to the beach.I asked my Dad who said we would go to Kenneggy. After breakfast Mum asked me and my two sisters to pack our beach bags while she packed the picnic lunch. We drove to Kenneggy and walked down a long overgrown path to a ladder which lead down to the beach. I was pleased to see two of my friends who joined us on an expedition over the rocks. The first bay we came to was filled with seaweed about 10cm deep. With excitment we waded through it. At the other side was a pretty waterfall which made a brown iron stain on the rocks. We climbed up a steep rock face to the coastal path which led us back to the ladder. We hungrily ate our picnic and then went for a quick swim. At 6pm we went home for tea.I watched T.V.and then to bed.What a lovely day!
